items.sentence: Does Tom still think he'll be in Australia all summer?
Do you think that Tom will be in Australia all summer?
Tom didn't let Mary see the letters John had sent him.
Tom wasn't really as drunk as he was pretending to be.
How could we have prevented this from happening again?
I think you should stay in Boston for a few more days.
Tom suggested that I stay in Boston for another month.
Tom says there is a haunted house in his neighborhood.
My family moved to Boston when I was three months old.
Tom told his son that getting a tattoo was a bad idea.
I would go to the library if I had a car to get there.
Mary is cute, but I don't think that she's very smart.
Do you still hang out with Tom as much as you used to?
Tom's car was found abandoned on the side of the road.
I don't think being poor is anything to be ashamed of.
You must take off your hats in the presence of ladies.
It doesn't matter to me whether Tom comes here or not.
Could you please pull the weeds and water the flowers?
I suppose you don't watch very much television, right?
I suspect that Tom and Mary are determined to do that.
